Class SmartHomeDashboard

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container

java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
SmartHomeDashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, Observable
public class SmartHomeDashboard
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements Observable
main frame that holds the dashboard and acts as a central hub
